newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - North Face Inc upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - North Face Inc upgraded.

text.p: -- Hambrecht and Quist analyst Shelly Hale Young said she upgraded North Face Inc to strong buy from buy and raised her 1997 earnings estimate, citing the accelerated roll-out of in-store concept shops.
-- The 1997 earnings estimate was raised to $197 million, or $0.81 per share, from $195 million, or $0.75 per share. Young estimates 1998 earnings of $242 million, or $1.10 a share.
-- Young said branded apparel is expected to sell very well this holiday season and North Face's recent stock pull-back offers a "very attractive buying opportunity."
